summary: In 2021, the President issued several executive directives to advance racial equity and support historically marginalized groups at home and abroad. In response, the State Department and USAID are working to better support such groups abroad (e.g., ethnic groups, women, and youth). They have established priority goals, conducted assessments, and updated policies to better integrate equity into their activities. These agencies also face challenges, including...
title: Foreign Assistance: State and USAID Are Taking Actions to Advance Equity Abroad and Mitigate Challenges
